00039 #include "../Property.hpp"
00040 #include "../PropertyBag.hpp"
00041 #include "VectorComposition.hpp"
00042 #include "../Logger.hpp"
00043 #include <ostream>
00044 #include <sstream>
00045 
00046 namespace RTT {
00047     namespace types {
00048     using namespace detail;
00049 
00050     bool composeProperty(const PropertyBag& bag, std::vector<double>& result)
00051     {
00052         if ( bag.getType() == "std::vector<double>" || bag.getType() == "array" ) {
00053             Property<double>* comp;
00054             int dimension = bag.size();
00055             result.resize( dimension );
00056 
00057             // Get values
00058             int size_correction = 0;
00059             for (int i = 0; i < dimension ; i++) {
00060                 PropertyBase* element = bag.getItem( i );
00061                 comp = dynamic_cast< Property<double>* >( element );
00062                 if ( comp == 0 ) {
00063                     // detect LEGACY element:
00064                     if ( element->getName() == "Size" ) {
00065                         // oops, our result vector will be one smaller.
00066                         size_correction += 1;
00067                         continue;
00068                     }
00069                     Logger::log() << Logger::Error << "Aborting composition of Property< vector<double> > "
00070                                   << ": Exptected data element "<< i << " to be of type double"
00071                                   <<" got type " << element->getType()
00072                                   <<Logger::endl;
00073                     return false;
00074                 }
00075                 result[ i - size_correction ] = comp->get();
00076             }
00077             result.resize( dimension - size_correction );
00078         }
00079         else {
00080             Logger::log() << Logger::Error << "Composing Property< std::vector<double> > :"
00081                           << " type mismatch, got type '"<< bag.getType()
00082                           << "', expected type 'array'."<<Logger::endl;
00083             return false;
00084         }
00085         return true;
00086     }
00087 
00088 
00089 }}; // namespace RTT
